== Weekly Q+A Sessions ==

In the Ubuntu project transparency is always important to us. To this end we are holding weekly Q+A sessions with different leaders in the community. This provides an excellent opportunity to get clarity on some questions you have.

=== The Schedule ===

Each session takes place at 5.30pm UTC in #ubuntu-meeting

* 4th Feb 2011 - Pete Graner, Kernel Engineering Manager
* 11th Feb 2011 - Robbie, Server Engineering Manager
* 18th Feb 2011 - TBC
* 25th Feb 2011 - TBC
* 4th March 2011 - TBC
* 11th March 2011 - TBC
* 18th March 2011 - TBC
